function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear role of airborne particles in virus transmission","Impact":"Potential misunderstanding of transmission routes leading to ineffective mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Further research and data collection to clarify the role of airborne particles, as well as increased emphasis on other transmission routes (e.g., surface contact, droplet spread)","Technologies":"Advanced particle monitoring and air purification systems","People":"Public health experts, policymakers, building managers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission of virus by asymptomatic individuals","Impact":"Increased difficulty in controlling the spread of the virus due to undetected carriers","Mitigation":"Regular testing and tracing of individuals, as well as public education on the potential for asymptomatic transmission","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, contact tracing apps, public awareness campaigns","People":"Healthcare workers, public health agencies, general population","Owner":"Public health authorities, government health departments"},{"Description":"Wide range of droplet sizes emitted during speaking and coughing","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately assessing the risk of droplet transmission and identifying appropriate protective measures","Mitigation":"Development of versatile personal protective equipment and ventilation systems that can address a wide range of droplet sizes","Technologies":"Advanced filtration materials, adjustable ventilation systems","People":"Healthcare workers, building designers, public health experts","Owner":"Medical supply companies, research institutions, building management"}]}
